events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will begin processing it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering roles to ensure the right team reviews your qualifications.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering positions has been assigned to guide you through the hiring process.
The initial screening interview has been completed successfully, and you are moving forward in the process.
Thank you for confirming your availability; we appreciate your prompt response to schedule the technical interview.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 10 AM UTC. Please prepare accordingly.
You have successfully completed the technical interview. Our team is reviewing your performance and will follow up soon.
The HR interview has been scheduled for May 15th at 2 PM UTC to discuss your fit within the company culture.
Your HR interview went well, and we are pleased with your responses regarding team collaboration and values.
We are excited to propose you an offer for the Software Engineer position, including competitive salary and benefits.
Thank you for your positive feedback on the offer. We are glad the terms meet your expectations.
We are delighted to hear that you have accepted our offer and look forward to welcoming you aboard.
Your onboarding process has commenced, and your access to developer resources will be provided shortly.
The hiring process is now complete, and we are excited to have you join our engineering team.
